attributes.action: change the law so that children under 10 should not be allowed to live in flats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not want children to live in flats any higher than the ground  floor. keeping the children of this country safe and well.
Balconies and windows are easily climbed over and into.

they also need gardens to develop

Many thanks
